p: HPLC-grade solvents were obtained from Scharlau (Spain) and Merck Millipore (Darmstadt, Germany). HPLC-DAD data were obtained on an Agilent Series 1260 (Agilent Technologies, USA) system, consisting of a vacuum degasser, a quaternary mixing pump, an autosampler, a column oven, and a diode-array detector (DAD) using a ZORBAX Eclipse XDB C18 column (150 mm x 4,6 mm, 5 μm) equipped with a ZORBAX Eclipse XDB C18 guard column (12.5 mm × 4.6 mm, 5 μm) (Agilent Technologies, USA). A mixture of 0.1% v/v of acetic acid in water (mobile phase A) and methanol (MeOH) (mobile phase B) was utilized as the mobile phase.
